author: Pomax
content:
#Taking a road trip or a camera

We went on a 10 day Northern California road trip,  and brought a camera. This turned out to be a good idea, and a bad idea, because we ended up with some 3200 photographs to sift through afterwards. If you're a casual shooter, that's insane. If you're a professional shooter you might think "eh, bracket shots and the like, 1-in-10~15 recovery of what ends up a decent shot, the rest is cutting room floor" and you'd be closer to the truth.
